title: Spread: Thunder (-4.5)
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 7 at 3:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Thunder" if the Thunder win the game by 5 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Rockets". If the game ends in a tie, this market will resolve to "Rockets".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
